trans-unit.source: Represents a set of eviction and expiration details for a specific cache entry.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et sett med forkasting og utløpsdato detaljer for en bestemt hurtigbufferoppføringen.

trans-unit.source: A CacheItemPolicy instance contains information that can be associated with a cache entry.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av CacheItemPolicy inneholder informasjon som kan knyttes til en hurtigbufferoppføringen.

trans-unit.source: For example, when a cache entry is about to be removed from the cache, a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments> object is passed to a callback method.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når en hurtigbufferoppføringen er ferd med å bli fjernet fra hurtigbufferen, en <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments>objekt som er sendt til en tilbakeringing-metode.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments.UpdatedCacheItemPolicy%2A> property of the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments> object can pass a reference to a CacheItemPolicy instance that can include eviction and expiration details about the cache entry.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments.UpdatedCacheItemPolicy%2A>for den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments>objekt kan sende en referanse til en CacheItemPolicy-forekomst som kan inkludere forkasting og utløpsdato detaljer om hurtigbufferoppføringen.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments> </xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateArguments.UpdatedCacheItemPolicy%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some methods in the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache> and <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> classes accept a CacheItemPolicy instance to describe eviction or expiration policy.
trans-unit.target: Noen metoder i den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache>og <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>klasser godtar en CacheItemPolicy-forekomst for å beskrive forkasting eller utløp.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> </xref:System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCache>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cache entry should be evicted after a specified duration.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en hurtigbufferoppføringen skal bli forkastet etter en angitt varighet.

trans-unit.source: The period of time that must pass before a cache entry is evicted.
trans-unit.target: Hvor lang tid før en hurtigbufferoppføringen er forkastet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.InfiniteAbsoluteExpiration"></xref>, meaning that the entry does not expire.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.InfiniteAbsoluteExpiration"> </xref>, betydning oppføringen ikke utløper.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor"></xref> objects that are associated with a cache entry.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling av <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.ChangeMonitor"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til en hurtigbufferoppføringen.

trans-unit.source: You can add to or remove change monitors that are associated with a cache entry.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til eller fjerne endre skjermer som er knyttet til en hurtigbufferoppføringen.

trans-unit.source: However, the set of change monitors must be complete before you pass a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy> instance to an <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Settet med endre skjermer må imidlertid være fullført før du sender en <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy>serverforekomsten til en <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>implementering.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> </xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy>

trans-unit.source: If you change the set of change monitors on a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy> object after the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy> object has been passed to an <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementation, the changes have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du endrer settet med endre skjermer på en <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy>objekt etter den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy>objektet ble sendt til en <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache>implementering, endringene har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> </xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy> </xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPolicy>

trans-unit.source: A collection of change monitors.
trans-unit.target: En samling av endre skjermer.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom samling.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a priority setting that is used to determine whether to evict a cache entry.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en prioritet-innstilling som brukes til å finne ut om du vil forkaste en hurtigbufferoppføringen.

trans-unit.source: In ASP.NET, the priority enumeration only has two possible priorities: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority> (which means no priority), and <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority> (which means the entry cannot be removed).
trans-unit.target: I ASP.NET har prioritet opplistingen bare to mulige prioriteringer: <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority>(som betyr ingen prioritet), og <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority>(det vil si at posten kan ikke fjernes).</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority> </xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the only priority that can be set is whether a cache entry should remain in the cache forever.
trans-unit.target: Bare prioriteten som kan angis er derfor om en hurtigbufferoppføringen må alltid beholdes i hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Adding an entry to the cache with a priority level of <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority> can cause the cache to overflow with entries that can never be removed.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Å legge til en oppføring i hurtigbufferen med et prioriteringsnivå for <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority>kan føre til at hurtigbufferen til å overskride med poster som ikke kan fjernes.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority>

trans-unit.source: Cache implementations should set the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority> priority for a cache entry only if the cache implementation provides ways to evict entries from the cache and to manage the number of cache entries.
trans-unit.target: Hurtigbufferen implementeringer bør angi den <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority>prioriteten for hurtigbufferoppføringen Hvis hurtigbufferen implementeringen gir måter å utestenge poster fra hurtigbufferen og administrere antallet oppføringer.</xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority>

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the priority for eviction.
trans-unit.target: En av de nummereringsverdier som angir prioriteten for forkasting.

trans-unit.source: The default priority value is <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority"></xref>, which means no priority.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien for prioritet er <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheItemPriority"> </xref>, noe som betyr at ingen prioritet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedCallback"></xref> delegate that is called after an entry is removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en referanse til en <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedCallback"> </xref> representanten kalles når en oppføring er fjernet fra hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: After a cache entry has been removed from the cache, the cache invokes the callback object that is referenced by the RemovedCallback property.
trans-unit.target: Når en bufferoppføringen har blitt fjernet fra hurtigbufferen, aktiverer hurtigbufferen tilbakeringing-objektet som refereres til av egenskapen RemovedCallback.

trans-unit.source: A cache implementation can use this callback to notify the calling method that a cache entry has been removed.
trans-unit.target: En hurtigbuffer implementering kan bruke denne tilbakeringing som skal varsles metoden kall en bufferoppføringen har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: A reference to a delegate that is called by a cache implementation.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til en representant kalles av en hurtigbuffer implementering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cache entry should be evicted if it has not been accessed in a given span of time.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en hurtigbufferoppføringen skal bli forkastet hvis den ikke har blitt åpnet i en gitt tidsperiode.

trans-unit.source: A span of time within which a cache entry must be accessed before the cache entry is evicted from the cache.
trans-unit.target: En tidsperiode som en hurtigbufferoppføringen åpnes før hurtigbufferoppføringen er kastet ut fra hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.NoSlidingExpiration"></xref>, meaning that the item should not be expired based on a time span.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache.NoSlidingExpiration"> </xref>, betydning at elementet ikke skal være utløpt basert på et tidsrom.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a reference to a <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateCallback"></xref> delegate that is called before a cache entry is removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en referanse til en <xref href="System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryUpdateCallback"> </xref> representant kalles før en hurtigbufferoppføringen er fjernet fra hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: A reference to a delegate that is called by a cache implementation.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til en representant kalles av en hurtigbuffer implementering.
